statements: SELECT * FROM SocialMediaSupport WHERE platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT id, username, timestamp FROM SocialMediaSupport WHERE id = 100;
SELECT platform, username FROM SocialMediaSupport WHERE timestamp >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT message FROM SocialMediaSupport WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaSupport ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaSupport;
SELECT id, username, platform, timestamp FROM SocialMediaSupport ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, platform, COUNT(*) AS total_messages FROM SocialMediaSupport GROUP BY username, platform;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaSupport WHERE platform = 'Twitter' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, username, message FROM SocialMediaSupport WHERE message LIKE '%urgent%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, social_media_handle FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT ticket_description, status, created_at FROM SupportTicket WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(ticket_id) AS total_tickets FROM SupportTicket GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM SupportTicket WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT customer_name, ticket_description, created_at FROM Customer JOIN SupportTicket ON Customer.customer_id = SupportTicket.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, status, created_at FROM Customer JOIN SupportTicket ON Customer.customer_id = SupportTicket.customer_id WHERE status = 'Closed';
SELECT COUNT(ticket_id) AS total_tickets, status FROM SupportTicket GROUP BY status;
SELECT * FROM EngagingCustomers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, message FROM EngagingCustomers WHERE platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT id, response_time, response_text FROM CustomerResponses WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT agent_name FROM SupportAgents WHERE availability = true;
SELECT * FROM CustomerResponses ORDER BY response_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM EngagingCustomers LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, username, platform FROM EngagingCustomers WHERE platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT * FROM CustomerResponses ORDER BY response_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT agent_name, availability FROM SupportAgents WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT id, username, platform, message FROM EngagingCustomers WHERE platform = 'Facebook' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT agent_name, agent_email FROM agents ORDER BY agent_name DESC;
SELECT agent_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS interaction_count FROM interactions GROUP BY agent_id HAVING interaction_count > 5;

SELECT customers.customer_name, messages.message_text, interactions.interaction_timestamp FROM customers INNER JOIN messages ON customers.customer_id = messages.customer_id INNER JOIN interactions ON messages.message_id = interactions.message_id ORDER BY interactions.interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, social_media_handle FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT agent_name, support_platform FROM SupportAgents WHERE support_platform = 'email';
SELECT message_id, message_text, timestamp FROM Messages ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Doe%';
SELECT * FROM Messages WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT Customers.customer_name, SupportAgents.agent_name, Interactions.interaction_type FROM Customers INNER JOIN Interactions ON Customers.customer_id = Interactions.customer_id INNER JOIN SupportAgents ON Interactions.agent_id = SupportAgents.agent_id;

SELECT Customers.customer_name, SupportAgents.agent_name, Interactions.interaction_type FROM Customers INNER JOIN Interactions ON Customers.customer_id = Interactions.customer_id INNER JOIN SupportAgents ON Interactions.agent_id = SupportAgents.agent_id WHERE Interactions.interaction_type = 'Chat';
